roleset.name: to rise up against an authority
roleset.note: REVOLT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revolt' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN.Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet Experiencer_Obj, Change_of_Leadership.Comparison with 'repulse.' (from revolt.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Simple Transitive
example.text: John revolted against Mary's tyrannical rule.

roleset.name: to repulse and/or disgust
roleset.note: REVOLT-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from revolt.02-v)

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Passive
example.text: Mary-1 was revolted *-1 by John's pile of dirty dishes.
example.arg: by John's pile of dirty dishes

roleset.name: revolt, act in part of a revolution
roleset.note: REVOLUTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Loose comparison to verb entry revolt.01. No VN class, FN Change_of_leadership. (from revolution.01-n)

example.name: All args
example.text: Why did the Americans win their revolution against England?

roleset.name: ground-breaking, radical
roleset.note: REVOLUTIONARY-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to revolution-n.01 (from revolutionary.01-j)

example.text: Many of his ideas were revolutionary; almost all were controversial.

roleset.name: to bring about a radical change
roleset.note: REVOLUTIONIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revolutionize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from revolutionize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: But researchers say [0] the drug , called [*]FK-506 , could revolutionize the transplantation field by [*] reducing harmful side effects and by [*] lowering rejection rates .
example.arg: by [*] reducing harmful side effects and by [*]lowering rejection rates

roleset.name: to move in a circle, be centered
roleset.note: REVOLVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revolve' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from revolve.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The book revolves around John Mariotta , the founder of the company , and Fred Neuberger , who [*T*-1] became his partner soon after Wedtech 's creation .
example.arg: around John Mariotta , the founder of the company , and Fred Neuberger , who [*T*-1] became his partner soon after Wedtech 's creation
